channel.title: What does this mean?
channel.description:
in the tutoria section this is cahpter 5 of making a server and it doesn't really make since, can anyone tell me what to do?:
Open Network & Internet Connections. Right click on the connection you're using to connect to the internet and click properties. Open the Advanced tab and click on firewall settings. Open the Exceptions tab and at the bottom you should see a button "Add Port". Click on it, and add your server name or whatever you want it to be at the Name field. At the Port number fill in 43594. And make sure the TCP box has been checked.

item.title: What does this mean?
item.dc:creator: @piiwii piiwii
item.description:
@piiwii wrote:

ok you need to click on
#1 Control Panel
#2 Than Network & Internet Connections
#3 And at the bottem you see Firewall Settings click that
#4 at the top now the 3 tabs click on the one that says Exceptions
#5 now you see a lest, at the bottem you see 4 buttens one says Add Port click that
#6 Type the name of your server in the Name field
#7 Type the port (43594) in there the Port number field
#8 Than Click the little dot thats nex to the (TCP) is checked
#9 Click ok, than scroll down the list and fined your servers name or whatever you put in the name field and check the box nex to it
#10 Click ok on the bottem, and your all done.

Hope this helps

Lol…

Read full topic

item.title: What does this mean?
item.dc:creator: @bed240 bed240
item.description:
@bed240 wrote:

Open Network & Internet Connections - this is found in your control panel

Right click on the connection you’re using to connect to the internet and click properties.- this is in that wich will have a few connections like local area conection and test ect… you want the one wich has the numbers before it eg.1232 connection". And right click that n propertys at botom or drop down thingy.

Open the Advanced tab and click on firewall settings. - the advanced tab is in the propertys wich u clicked on and the firewall settings will be there.

Open the Exceptions tab and at the bottom you should see a button “Add Port”.- you should see the tab as said in the tutorial and just do as it says.(basicly your adding a new port specificly for your server i think)

Click on it, and add your server name or whatever you want it to be at the Name field.-do as said pretty straight forward
At the Port number fill in 43594.-straight forward just follow
And make sure the TCP box has been checked.-straight forward just follow not hard.

and then thats that
Youve now basicly added a new port wich will work specificly for your server i think.
hope i helped in a small way

what he said lmao i dno i tried lol

Read full topic

item.title: What does this mean?
item.dc:creator: @D_D_3 D D 3
item.description:
@D_D_3 wrote:

This stops your firewall from blocking the port 43594.

Read full topic

item.title: What does this mean?
item.dc:creator: @dki_demon dki demon
item.description:
@dki_demon wrote:

in the tutoria section this is cahpter 5 of making a server and it doesn’t really make since, can anyone tell me what to do?:

Open Network & Internet Connections. Right click on the connection you’re using to connect to the internet and click properties. Open the Advanced tab and click on firewall settings. Open the Exceptions tab and at the bottom you should see a button “Add Port”.
Click on it, and add your server name or whatever you want it to be at the Name field.
At the Port number fill in 43594.
And make sure the TCP box has been checked.
